data.message: I need help can somebody please message me and tell me how to block candy crush saga requests in Munster city requests and other stupid game requests I get like 50 messages a day requesting to play games

replies.message: Hi Tyler. You can block a game or an app by following these easy steps from our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/121070141307903. When you block an app or game, it won't be able to access any of your Facebook information or send you any requests. Hope this helps! -Hailey
